doc_curation.pdf¶

Curate and process pdf files.

doc_curation.pdf.ocr(pdf_path, google_key='/home/vvasuki/sysconf/kunchikA/google/sanskritnlp/service_account_key.json')[source]¶

OCR some pdf with google drive. Automatically splits into 25 page bits and ocrs them individually.
